content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction setup at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)
- Beltgroup (position connecting mining drill to furnace)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position connecting furnace to assembling machine)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires both iron-plates and iron-gear-wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when trying to inspect or update inventories
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to inspect is valid and not empty before checking its inventory.
